texts.text: Ediâ€™s best pet is on the bench bed.
The best pet is a red hen.
Where is the hen? She is in a swell pen.
The red hen pecks the feed in the pen.
The red hen is tired and rests in the pen.
Tell the red hen to get up.
Check the hen. The hen is not well
The red hen is not well and rests in the nest.
How is the hen? Edi checks the hen.
Where is Edi going? He is stepping into the pen.
Edi steps into the nest and checks the henâ€™s head.
Edi steps into the nest and checks the henâ€™s leg.
Edi steps into the nest and checks the henâ€™s neck.
Edi pets the hen and says, â€œDonâ€™t fret.â€
The hen is better. The hen takes a step.
What is in the nest? An egg is in the nest.
The hen lays eggs. The hen is the best pet.
